column5: Just a heads up.  My favourite grub for walleye (Yum pink and white) are avaiable at the local Giant Tiger for 97 cents per 8 pack. A 15 pack at CTC is 4.99 here. I bought 63 packs (mixed up the colours).  I don't know if they are available at all stores but definately worth a look.  muddler
Wow, great deal!  Not sure if the GT is open yet here in Woodstock?  The better half made me a believer in Yum last year...it pretty much kicked Gulp's butt!!!!

Walmart does that from time to time as well.  The sad part is I had seen a guy stuffing 2 other bads into one to get 3 bags for a buck...  And yes Frank, YUM is my 2nd pick for soft plastic baits as thay are good.
This happens at BPS almost every day, 2 for 1, 3 for 1...... customer decide what the discount is.
well senkos ar 10 bucks a pack at bps, so even if you stuffed one bag into another its only a mediocre deal. ...not that I am advocating stealing but bps is way over priced.
